body.name: Geek Chef Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo,16QT Convection Ovens Countertop, 4 Slice Toaster, 9-inch Pizza, with Warm, Broil, Toast, Bake, Air Fry, Oil-Free, 100+ Online Video Recipes & Accessories
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 13 hrs 13 mins
features: 【Satisfy Family Needs】- With a 16-quart capacity and 3-layer even cooking, this oven can cook up to 4 slices of bread, a 9-inch pizza, or a 700g of chicken wings, making it perfect for preparing family meals or holiday dinners.

【All-in-One Cooking】- The 4-knob operation (timer, temperature, function, speed) makes it easy to use for people of all ages. You can cook a variety of foods, such as cake, chicken, fish, pizza, steak, toast, and even fries, all with this multi-functional oven.

【Smart Cooking Experience】- Access 100+ video recipes through the app to try new dishes every day. The oven is made of stainless steel, making it durable and easy to clean. It's the perfect gift for family and friends.

【Even Cooking with 360° Hot Air】- Our air fryer oven uses 360° air convection technology to cook food evenly. The fan speed can be adjusted for the perfect crisp and delicious food with up to 75% less fat.
【Convenient and Service-Oriented】- This oven comes with a baking pan, air fryer basket, wire rack, and crumb tray. Geek Chef offers a 1-year warranty and 24/7 customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice toaster oven/air fryer
reviews.reviewText: The first oven I purchased was broken.. didn't heat up correctly or even toast bread. I returned it and decided to give it another chance. The second one seems to be working just fine. I like it for it's smaller size and it fits on my counter nicely. It has easy knob controls and is easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than regular air fryers
reviews.reviewText: I have 5 stars but it’s more like 4.5 because it isn’t very intuitive at first. It takes a few tries on each setting to figure out how to use it. It has options for toast, bake, broil, air fry, etc. and they each perform quite well once you figure out how to configure it.- I use toast for breakfast sandwiches, garlic bread, and bagels.- Bake I have used to reverse sear a steak (I left it in too long lol) and to make some chicken wings- Air fry I use for everything I normally cook in my old air fryer, but it has a much higher capacity and the ability to cook things that require different temps by using the different racks- I use broil to melt cheese and put a nice color on top of pizzaIt has a wide variety of uses and for the price is absolutely worth buying. It just takes a bit to figure out how to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good so far
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t used my airfryer yet. I opened up the box and so far I’m pretty impressed. It has everything I was looking for: It doesn’t just air fry- it bakes, broils, etc. The door is see through which means I can check on the food without opening the air fryer. Lastly, the control knobs are easy to understand, not too tech-y. Which is great because my mom is not too keen with digital panels. This is my early Christmas present to my family, and myself :)I might update my review after using it to see if it’s worth a 5 star review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Geek Chef =Quality
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely satisfied with Geek Chef. I used all the cooking options and everything i have cooked, including air frying fish, cooked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for one or two people
reviews.reviewText: This oven is versatile and roomy enough to cook everything I once made in a full sized oven, albeit in scaled down quantities. I like that the controls are easy to see and use..I shopped hard for a compact counter top oven high enough to have two optional cooking levels. The footprint on this is smaller than the one we replaced. I am happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Okay my first clue should have been a brand I've never heard of and the limited owners manual written in broken English but I had to send this back because the toaster oven and regular oven features did not work. Everything I tried to toast or bake was burnt on the bottom and not done on the top. The air fryer seemed to be okay but it was very loud. I replaced with a Cuisinart and its great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this in July 2023. Since it arrived, I've used this everyday since. I fell in love with it that I no longer use my kitchen oven or microwave. I was happy with my purchase.2 months of having it, I was going to broil salmon for dinner. Noticed it wasn't broiling. The upper heating elements were not working. Not sure if they ever have. I've never seen them red. I've seen the bottom elements red hot. On broil, they for sure should not be black. Unfortunately it's passed the 30 days to return. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Initially loved it but now…
reviews.reviewText: Final Edit 11/15/23: GC has corrected the issue and my new unit was delivered. Thank you for standing by your warranty, Geek Chef!Edited 11/8/23: GC has responded to my emails and is reportedly sending me a new machine! Will update again when the product arrives.I purchased this product in May 2023 and initially loved it! It’s just the right size for my young family and heats/cooks everything incredibly fast, however, it recently started smelling strongly of burning plastic, so much so that I am not able to use it. I contacted Geek Chef and they requested I comment on my Amazon purchase in order for them to honor their 1 year manufactures warranty. I will update if/when they (HOPEFULLY!) make this right because I have loved their product up until this point. Hoping to hear back from you, Geek Chef!
